Uses of Class
ui.Button

Packages that use Button 
Package Description
ui  

  • Uses of Button in ui

    Methods in ui that return Button 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Button Button.center​(boolean horizontal, boolean vertical, int xOffset, int yOffset)
    A proxy method of Component::center used to avoid having to cast Component to Button every time.
    Button Button.setActiveBgColour​(java.awt.Color c)
    Sets the background color to use when in ACTIVE state.
    Button Button.setActiveFgColour​(java.awt.Color c)
    Sets the foreground color to use when in ACTIVE state.
    Button Button.setBgColour​(java.awt.Color c)
    Sets the background color to use when in INACTIVE state.
    Button Button.setCallback​(java.lang.Runnable r)
    Sets the callback to use when the Button is clicked
    Button Button.setFgColour​(java.awt.Color c)
    Sets the foreground color to use when in INACTIVE state.
    Button Button.setHoveredBgColour​(java.awt.Color c)
    Sets the background color to use when in HOVERED state.
    Button Button.setHoveredFgColour​(java.awt.Color c)
    Sets the foreground color to use when in HOVERED state.
    Button Button.setPadding​(int p)
    Sets the padding of this Button to the provided integer value
